name: Rumble Repair
description:
--Movement--

R - Hold to Repair Plane

Space - Hold to boost

--Aiming--

Use the mouse to open

--Description--

Control... we have an issue. The I'm the only man on the ship and I can't fight all these pilots and repair the ship... Wait a minute, I have an idea

--Gameplay-- 

The meter at the bottom is you're plane's integrity (hp). Hold R to repair it - However it does stop you from shooting and moving so watch out!
